name: I Don't Even Game
description: I Don’t Even Game is a silly and nonsensical adventure game. Race through the screen and go through different scenarios: steal someone’s purse, go through a DUI check, drop your keys in a sewer hole. Pay attention to the text on the screen complete the interactions in order to move forward in the story. As you move along, you can check the upper tab to see which achievements have been ticked off.
